_header: Now here after will I show
Subjects: saints’ lives; Matthew, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Matthew, in the Scottish Legendary — couplets

CULGg26.First Lines:
[N]ow here eftyre will I schawof þe apostil sanct
                    mathew…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…ma trastly cum to IugmentAnd bruke þe Ioy þat hym
                    is lent
CULGg26.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 1.92-9.
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth

             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 1.190-207.
